notifications.title: Critical Hazard Reported
notifications.message: Roof instability detected in Section 3A - East Wing. Area evacuated pending inspection.

notifications.title: Gas Leak - Section 4B
notifications.message: Methane levels elevated near ventilation shaft. Ventilation team responding. Avoid area until cleared.

notifications.title: Equipment Maintenance Alert
notifications.message: Ventilation Fan VF-1 maintenance due tomorrow. Ensure backup ventilation is operational.

notifications.title: Shift Change Reminder
notifications.message: Afternoon shift begins at 2:00 PM. All personnel must complete safety briefing before entering mine.

notifications.title: Weekly Safety Meeting
notifications.message: Mandatory safety meeting scheduled for Friday, November 29 at 8:00 AM in the main conference room.

notifications.title: Hazard Resolved
notifications.message: Belt Line 5 overheating issue has been resolved. Roller replaced and system operational.

notifications.title: Continuous Miner CM-2 Down
notifications.message: Continuous Miner CM-2 is under maintenance. Cutting head motor replacement in progress. Expected completion: November 30.

notifications.title: Production Target Update
notifications.message: Great work team! We're at 92% of monthly production target with 4 days remaining.

notifications.title: Ventilation Issue Reported
notifications.message: Reduced air circulation in Section 5D. Investigation underway. Non-essential personnel advised to avoid area.

notifications.title: Weather Advisory
notifications.message: Heavy rain expected tomorrow. Ensure all drainage systems are clear and monitor water accumulation.

notifications.title: Safety Milestone Achieved
notifications.message: Congratulations! 100 days without a lost-time incident. Keep up the excellent safety practices!

notifications.title: New PPE Distribution
notifications.message: New helmets with integrated communication systems available at equipment room. Exchange during next shift.
